GSD.product_version: versions from v3.14 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: f_fs: stricter integer overflow checks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit b6535bf40a9fcc6cc36306c988019b2236385aa8, it was introduced in version v3.14 by commit e6f3862fa1ecea6579dd1727869655e88be7a5ef. For more details please see the references link.
